thread.title: Live chat replay: Our Boise State football reporters answer reader questions
thread.title_full: Live chat replay: Our Boise State football reporters answer reader questions

author: ccripe@idahostatesman.com (Chadd Cripe)
title: Live chat replay: Our Boise State football reporters answer reader questions
text:
Print Join The Conversation 
Idaho Statesman is pleased to provide this opportunity to share information, experiences and observations about what's in the news. Some of the comments may be reprinted elsewhere in the site or in the newspaper. We encourage lively, open debate on the issues of the day, and ask that you refrain from profanity, hate speech, personal comments and remarks that are off point. Thank you for taking the time to offer your thoughts. 
Commenting FAQs | Terms of Service About This Blog 
Chadd Cripe is in his 14th season covering Boise State football. He votes in the Associated Press Top 25 and was honored as the top beat writer in the nation by APSE in 2014. 
Follow Chadd on Twitter at @IDS_BroncoBeat . Recent Posts
